QuestData.Title: Hotter than Hell
QuestData.Description: It's no good, $n! No matter how many coals I put to the fire, it's just not enough heat.$B$BThere's only one thing I can think of that is hot enough to temper this key and it is the insides of the Legion's fel reavers.$B$BI've only ever seen one downed once. I remember seeing its insides fuming, shooting fire and steam as it fell. Take this mold and plunge it into a fallen fel reaver. I recommend you get yourself some friends if you plan to take one down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy a Fel Reaver in Hellfire Peninsula and plunge the Unfired Key Mold into its remains. Bring the Charred Key Mold to Rohok in Thrallmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you do what I asked of you, $C?
QuestData.RewardText: You've succeeded! Only thing left for you to do is try it out.
